Name: Percentage of cases where Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER occurs out of all completed reimbursement cases (i.e., those ending in Payment Handled)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Frequency of Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER compared to the frequency of Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Percentage of process variants containing Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER that eventually lead to Payment Handled without any rejection
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Number of times Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER is immediately preceded by Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' activities

Name: Percentage of Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER activities that are followed by Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Frequency of Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER in variants that do not include any rejection activity (e.g., Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION, Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER, etc.)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all cases where 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' does not happen

Name: Percentage of Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER occurrences relative to the total number of approval activities (including Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION, Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER, and Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all cases

Name: Number of process instances where Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER appears more than once
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' activities

Name: Percentage of variants containing Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER that originate from a prior rejection by ADMINISTRATION or PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Frequency of Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER in cases with claim amounts above 100 euros
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER activities that occur in the same case as at least one Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Ratio of the frequency of Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER to the frequency of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER across all cases
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of cases where Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER is present but Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER never occurs
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all cases where 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' does not happen

Name: Number of variants in which Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER directly follows Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION without intermediate rejections
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' activities

Name: Percentage of Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER executions that belong to the top three most frequent successful variants (ending in Payment Handled)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Payment Handled'
